name: Tale of Fallen Dragons
description: This is a dungeon crawler game with roguelike elements based on Ancient Chinese story. Under the Fallen Dragons Temple, you`ll fight with various dragons which all have different shapes. The art style is based on real artifacts from China, we hope you could experience a different style of our culture.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.2Ghz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Storage: 256 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2Ghz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Storage: 512 MB available space
